Module edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp
Package edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp.helper

Class TimeHelper

java.lang.Object
edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp.helper.TimeHelper
public class TimeHelper extends Object
This class is a utility/helper class which provides various date and time related methods. It primarily deals with time conversions between different timezones, and to and from different formats (Date, LocalDate, LocalTime, Timestamp). It also provides methods to get business hours and timezone information.
Author:
Parham Modirniya

      Returns:

    • generateBusinessHours

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> generateBusinessHours(int hoursOffset)
      Generates a list of business hours with 15 minute intervals, adjusted to the user's timezone.
      Parameters:
      hoursOffset - The number of hours to offset from the base business hours (8 AM to 9 PM EST).
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of strings representing the business hours.

    • getESTTimeDifference

      public static double getESTTimeDifference()
      Calculates the timezone difference between the system's timezone and Eastern Standard Time (EST).
      Returns:
      The difference in hours as a double.

      Parameters:
      localDate - The LocalDate part of the date-time.
      strTime - The string representation of the time in the format "HH:mm".
      Returns:
